subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather said Tuesday on his Twitter account that he would end a 16-month hiatus and face the World Boxing Council welterweight champion Victor Ortiz (29-2) on Sept. 17.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather said Tuesday on his Twitter account that he would end a 16-month hiatus and face the World Boxing Council welterweight champion Victor Ortiz (29-2) on Sept. 17.
